bibl.title: Six Documentary Fragments from Oxford Collections.
bibl.note: 1. P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. III 8a. Receipt for gold. Oxyrhynchus, early IVth century. - 2. P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. II 99a. Foot of a document. Hermopolite (?), 24 July 320. - 3. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. d. 36b (P). Writing practice. Arsinoite, 353? - 4. P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. II 179b. Top of a document. Hermopolite (?), 380. - 5. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. f. 34 (P). Sale of wine on delivery. Heracleopolite, 528/9? - 6. P. E.E.S. Misc. Inv. II 211b. Top of a document. Hermopolis (?), 611-19?
